bug.author: jfelectron
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
Spacy 2.1 In [1]: import spacy In [2]: spacy_nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm') In [3]: [d.text for d in spacy_nlp(u'I have a dog')] Out[3]: [u'I', u'h', u'a', u'v', u'e', u'a', u'd', u'o', u'g'] Spacy 2.0 In [1]: import spacy In [2]: spacy_nlp = spacy.load('en_core_web_sm') In [3]: [d.text for d in spacy_nlp(u'I have a dog')] Out[3]: [u'I', u'have', u'a', u'dog'] <denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Ubuntu 18.10 Python Version Used: Python spaCy Version Used: 2.0/2.1 Environment Information: ?

comments.comment: This is the same issue as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/3356>#3356</denchmark-link> and seems to be something related to Python 2 in some specific configuration. Unfortunately, we haven't been able to reproduce this yet on any of our test machines or CI
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
